EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-EM-Broker-Nurture.nurture-09
EmailTemplate.subject: $0 mental health visit fee
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Meeting the growing demand for mental health services caused by the pandemic Employers need new, cost‑effective and innovative ways to provide their employees mental health services. HealthiestYou is a high‑quality virtual care solution designed to serve the unique needs of small businesses and their employees. HealthiestYou Complete Bundle allows members to quickly make informed decisions about what mental health professionals they see, where they go and how much they should expect to pay—all from the palm of their hand. The HealthiestYou Complete Bundle includes mental healthcare that offers: - Proven clinical outcomes and world‑class member engagement - The chance to build relationships with your choice of mental health provider - Connect to doctors and get expert opinions with $0 visit fees About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
